item.title: Custom Keyboard Shortcuts on macOS
item.description: I changed my workflow a bit depending on keyboard shortcuts and different desktops and found a nifty tool called Hammerspoon that allows you to create custom keyboard shortcuts. It’s a Lua scripting language that allows you to write small scripts that can be triggered by keyboard shortcuts.
